item.title: Manage PII
item.description: Gateway logs and PIICloudflare Gateway gives you multiple ways to safely handle your employees’ personally identifiable information (PII). You can choose to exclude PII from activity logging, or you can choose to redact PII from everyone except for designated administrators. ​​ Types of PII Cloudflare Gateway can log the following types of PII: Source IP User email User ID Device ID URL Referer User agent ​​ Exclude PII Enabling this setting means Cloudflare Gateway will log activity without storing any employee PII.
